job_tasks.phrase: instrumental in ensuring the successful adoption and utilization of our AI-driven solutions
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates a focus on understanding how the AI solutions fit into the business context and ensuring they are used effectively.

job_tasks.phrase: collect and analyze user feedback to inform future product developments and improvements
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to understand user needs and business impact to guide product strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: provide expert advice and support to our customers
job_tasks.justification: This implies understanding customer business needs to offer relevant advice and support.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide prompt engineering and best practices on the use of the solution to achieve the best results and outcomes
job_tasks.justification: Prompt engineering is a core task in developing and optimizing interactions with generative AI models, fitting within the broader software development lifecycle for AI applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide prompt engineering and best practices on the use of the solution to achieve the best results and outcomes
job_tasks.justification: Prompt engineering is a key aspect of interacting with and optimizing generative models, which falls under the 'Modeling' category in the context of GenAI.

soft_skills.phrase: managing beta testing phases to gather critical feedback on product features and issues
providing ongoing support and guidance to users post-release
Develop and deliver engaging training materials and programs for end-users to ensure effective product usage.
working closely with product development teams to identify, document, and address any product issues or enhancements.
Act as a liaison between the end-users and the technical team, translating technical information into user-friendly language.
offering proactive support and troubleshooting assistance.
managing beta testing phases to gather critical feedback on product features and issues
working closely with product development teams to identify, document, and address any product issues or enhancements.
Maintain up-to-date knowledge of AI technology trends and best practices to provide expert advice and support to our customers.
Provide prompt engineering and best practices on the use of the solution to achieve the best results and outcomes.

classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes customer success, training, and support for AI solutions, rather than direct development or deep technical modeling. While prompt engineering is mentioned, it's in the context of advising users, not building core AI systems. The primary focus aligns more with a customer-facing technical support or solutions engineer role.
